gatherInformation() - Method in class kavyaElchuriAssignemnt1.GenerateInvoice
Gather Information is for taking the user inputs like name and also to collect the item information consisting of name, price and quantity where name is a string, price is a double and quantity is an integer
GenerateInvoice - Class in kavyaElchuriAssignemnt1
This class has the methods required to capture the user information and print the invoice

getInvoiceNumber() - Method in class kavyaElchuriAssignemnt1.GenerateInvoice
